message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $900000. I believe this is a fair starting point, considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it's a good investment for me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. Considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $825000. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's true value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $775000. I think this is a more reasonable price, considering the product's value.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $775000. Considering the product's unique features and the value it can bring to the right buyer, I'm willing to offer a slight adjustment. I'm counteroffering at $810000. This price still reflects the product's true value, and I believe it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $810000 is a fair price. I'm willing to go up to $785000. I think this is a more reasonable price, considering the product's value.

Considering the product's exceptional quality and rarity, I'm willing to make a final adjustment. I'm counteroffering at $825000. This price still reflects the product's true value, and I believe it's a fair compromise. If this offer is not accepted, I will reconsider selling the product to John for $800000.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $800000. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
